data.name: continue
data.doc: When Moya encounters this tag in a loop, such as [tag]while[/tag] or [tag]for[/tag], it ignores the remaining code in the block and [i]continues[/i] to the next item in the loop.
data.synopsis: skip remaining code in a loop
data.example:
<let crew="['John', 'Rygel', 'Scorpius', 'Aeryn']"/>
        <for src="crew" dst="character">
            <if test="character == 'Scorpius'">
                <echo>Scorpius is not allowed on board!</eco>
                <continue/>
            </if>
            <echo>${character} is on board</echo>
        </for>
